msg: Remove unused fields and methods as a result of refactoring JAR handling

author: markt
msg: Refactor the implementation of the requirements of 10.7.2 of the spec.
Don't ignore whole JARs, just prevent applications from overriding spec
Note overriding of Java JRE provided classes is already prevented.
